thread.title: Never use painkillers for back pain, new guidelines say
thread.title_full: Never use painkillers for back pain, new guidelines say

title: Never use painkillers for back pain, new guidelines say
text: show ad Never use painkillers for back pain: New US guidelines say patients should rely on yoga and acupuncture for 3 months before even taking ibuprofen American College of Physicians' new guidelines say patients with back pain should try natural therapies for up to 12 weeks Only if the pain lasts more than 3 months should they try painkillers If that doesn't work, doctors can contemplate prescribing opioids like tramadol The new guidelines come amid America's growing drug addiction epidemic
